content.text: A balanced pH is essential to maximize the effectiveness of the treatments you apply to your spa. Starting your routine treatment by adjusting the pH will ensure the success of the other steps!
By using our Spa Chlor or Spa Broma sanitizing products regularly, you prevent the proliferation of bacteria, germs, viruses, moss and any living microorganisms in general.

Using one of Summer Smiles ® Spa Shok treatments treatments will allow you to quickly dissolve even the finest particles of organic waste and chloramines in your spa water. Also, don’t forget good maintenance practices such as cleaning your spa and filter regularly to remove organic waste.
